original_text: Then all the princes of the sea will step down from their thrones and remove their robes and strip off their embroidered garments. They will clothe themselves with trembling; they will sit on the ground and tremble every moment and be appalled at you.
korean_text: 그 때에 바다의 모든 왕이 그 보좌에서 내려 조복을 벗으며 수 놓은 옷을 버리고 떨림을 입듯 하고 땅에 앉아서 너로 말미암아 무시로 떨며 놀랄 것이며

sentences.original_text: Then all the princes of the sea
will step down from their thrones

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 화려한 옷을 벗을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and strip off their embroidered garments.
They will clothe themselves with trembling;
they will sit on the ground
